Package com.thomsonreuters.platformservices.ema.utils.chain

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Chain
    The root interface of chains.
    FlatChain
    The interface of a Chain implementation you can use to open flat chains (meaning non recursive chains).
    FlatChain.ChainCompleteFunction
    Represents an operation that is called when a chain is complete.
    FlatChain.ChainErrorFunction
    Represents an operation that is called when a chain is in error.
    FlatChain.ElementAddedFunction
    Represents an operation that is called when an element is added to a FlatChain.
    FlatChain.ElementChangedFunction
    Represents an operation that is called when an chain element changes.
    FlatChain.ElementRemovedFunction
    Represents an operation that is called when an element is removed from a chain.
    RecursiveChain
    The interface of a Chain implementation you can use to open recursive chains.
    RecursiveChain.ChainCompleteFunction
    Represents an operation that is called when a chain is complete.
    RecursiveChain.ChainErrorFunction
    Represents an operation that is called when a chain is in error.
    RecursiveChain.ElementAddedFunction
    Represents an operation that is called when an element is added to a FlatChain.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FlatChain.Builder
    Used to build FlatChain objects.
    RecursiveChain.Builder
    Used to build RecursiveChain objects.
    SummaryLinksToSkipByDisplayTemplate
    Holds the number of summary links to skip for different Display Templates used by chains.
    SummaryLinksToSkipByDisplayTemplate.Builder
    Used to build SummaryLinksToSkipByDisplayTemplate objects.
    SummaryLinksToSkipByDisplayTemplate.DisplayTemplateDescription
    Holds a Display Template description.
